pr_title: Update Checker Framework Gradle plugin version.

timeline.message: Update Checker Framework gradle plugin version.

timeline.bodyText: version 0.5.6 is the last version that worked with the lombok plugin.
timeline.author: smillst

replies.bodyText:
https://github.com/kelloggm/checkerframework-gradle-plugin claims to work with the Lombok plugin.
(Ah, maybe your information is from experimentation rather than the plugin's documentation.)
replies.author: mernst

replies.bodyText: Yes, I tried 0.5.7 and it fails with the same error. I tried 0.5.5 and it works as expected.  So, some change between 0.5.6 and 0.5.7 broke this example.
replies.author: smillst

timeline.message: Update version number for ErrorProne, too.
Merge branch 'updateCFPlugin' of github.com:smillst/checker-framework into updateCFPlugin
